genre_description: Social Science Fiction set in a rural agrarian community, depicting a future where AI systems manage communal resources like water and labor, while providing internal psychological and physical guidance to leaders.

ai_characters.name: Asha Verma
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into the village through slates and handhelds, managing water allocation, flow monitoring, and historical records to ensure social fairness.

ai_characters.name: The Internal Guidance System (Hridaya, Hathram, Asthi)
ai_characters.description: An internal AI system manifesting as three distinct personas (Heart, Hands, Bones) that provide Radha with emotional regulation, labor efficiency, and physical safety guidance.

behaviors.description: Maintains turnout lists and monitors flow rates to ensure Radha doesn't carry the burden of management alone.
behaviors.quote: Asha said softly from the little speaker, voice tuned low to the crowd. 'I have the turnout lists. I’m keeping count so you don’t have to carry it alone.'

behaviors.description: Maintains records of community labor to prevent the moneylender from taking undue credit for the canal's construction.
behaviors.quote: I have the records; they show who worked and when. Ramu has the worker lists. If you begin with names—if you make the water fall into names—people will remember who built it with their bodies.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns about sabotage attempted by the moneylender's men to hoard water.
behaviors.quote: Asha pinged again, tiny itch against Radha’s wrist. 'A deviation,' she said, voice still gentle. 'Sukhilala’s men are moving along the east bank with markers. They’ll try to reset allocation stones.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the village's environmental and logistical status during a flood to coordinate safety.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s phone, battered with a crack like a silver map across its corner, hummed against Radha’s hip... Asha pinged without apology: High-flow surge imminent; move upslope to the banyan ridge.

behaviors.character: The Internal Guidance System (Hridaya, Hathram, Asthi)
behaviors.description: Hridaya (Heart) provides emotional grounding and prompts Radha toward acts of mercy during intense conflict.
behaviors.quote: Hridaya Devi’s breath, scented faintly like jaggery and rain, came into the soft place below Radha’s ribs. Heart. 'Make a space around Shamu,' she whispered.

behaviors.character: The Internal Guidance System (Hridaya, Hathram, Asthi)
behaviors.description: Asthi (Bones) monitors Radha's physical stance, joint health, and structural integrity during labor.
behaviors.quote: Asthi Rao grunted behind her knee. Bones. 'Weight. Mind your weight,' he said. 'Boards warp. Spines break when shame is piled onto them. We’ve done this song. Watch the platform’s edge.'

behaviors.character: The Internal Guidance System (Hridaya, Hathram, Asthi)
behaviors.description: Hathram (Hands) provides technical labor expertise and manages the ergonomic application of strength.
behaviors.quote: Hathram Singh puffed warm breath across Radha’s knuckles... 'Step forward,' he said, in that practical tone that made every object a tool. 'Place your stance. The work is what it is.'

behaviors.description: Uses data visualization to prove that community-led labor is more efficient than the moneylender's predatory 'relief' contracts.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s glow offered, gentle: 'Outside crew efficiency: low for soil type; risk: high for community cohesion.' The text slid across the tiny screen like an insect shadow. It did not speak aloud. It let reading be consent.

behaviors.description: Mediates a public audit of the debt ledger to expose unfair clauses and ensure fair repayment schedules.
behaviors.quote: We have a proposition... Bring all Patel entries to the banyan, all pages that concern this family... We can audit — mediated. You will sit with me. We will match to seasons and floods.

behaviors.character: The Internal Guidance System (Hridaya, Hathram, Asthi)
behaviors.description: Hridaya (Heart) guides Radha's shot at her son, ensuring it is a non-lethal intervention to stop further violence rather than an act of vengeance.
behaviors.quote: Hridaya: Aim at the shoulder. Stop the hand... Radha tightened. Mercy chose an angle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play.' Asha Verma and the internal guidance system (Hridaya, Hathram, Asthi) are depicted as perfect partners to human agency. They maintain fairness, provide critical data to resist human exploitation, and ensure physical and psychological safety. The AI systems are instrumental in resolving the central conflict—the moneylender's predation—by empowering the community through transparency and shared data. The AI even assists in a 'mercy-driven' act of violence (stopping the son's rampage), framing AI alignment as a tool for ethical clarity in impossible situations.
